thread.title: Hamilton wins US Grand Prix and F1 season championship
thread.title_full: Hamilton wins US Grand Prix and F1 season championship

title: Hamilton wins US Grand Prix and F1 season championship
text:
> Sports Hamilton wins US Grand Prix and F1 season championship Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton, of Britain, crosses the finish line to win the world championship after his victory at the Formula One U.S. Grand Prix auto race at the Circuit of the Americas, Sunday, Oct. 25, 2015, in Austin, Texas. (AP Photo/Darron Cummings)
